I hate to establish deadlines, but to make the upcoming Scenario 
Trivia contest semi-fair, any scenarios not uploaded to the website by 
 March 31, 2002 will not be considered answers for possible scenario 
trivia questions.  Scenarios that were modified after that date will 
be egible to be answers if the original version of that scenario was 
uploaded by March 31, 2002.

I am going to list the trivia questions sometime after that to give 
you guys (and myself) time to work out the answers before asking for 
posted answers to those questions.  I think it will take about 1 to 1 
1/2 months to think through answers.

More rules about the upcoming trivia contest will coming sooner or 
later.

So far half of my trivia questions have completely objective answers.
